project_abstract.cdata: The Second Anhui Highway Project for China aims to support the social and economic developmentof Anhui Province by providing an efficient, safe, and cost-effective highway infrastructure and improve transport links. There are five project components: Component 1 expands highway capacity and promote regional integration by constructing approximately 116 km of trunk highway. Component 2 improves accessibility to low-income counties by rehabilitating and improving 243 km of the Class III/ IV highway network. Component 3 improves road safety by upgrading selected dangerous sections (blackspots) that are key to the road network. Component 4 strengthens the highway management capacity of Anhui Provincial Comnunications Department (APCD) through technical assistance and training, including studies on construction supervision, and overloading of vehicles.  Component 5 finances land acquisition and resettlement.

P076714.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>安徽公路项目二期</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>项目的目的是建设高效、安全、经济的公路基础设施，改善交通条件，从而支持安徽省的社会和经济发展。项目包括五方面内容：1、建设约116公里的主干线，扩大公路交通能力，促进区域一体化。2、对243公里的三级和四级公路网进行改造，改善低收入县的交通条件。3、有选择地对公路网的主要危险路段（事故多发点）进行升级改造，提高道路安全。4、通过技术援助和培训，包括开展对建筑监理和车辆超载问题的研究，加强安徽省交通厅的公路管理能力。5、为征地搬迁提供资金。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
